brief_title: Phase 3 Study to Evaluate IOP Lowering Therapy in Open Angle Glaucoma and Ocular Hypertension C-01-70
brief_summary: To compare intraocular pressure lowering effectiveness of a combination drug vs. two individual drugs dosed alone.
criteria: Adult subjects of either sex and any race with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension; visual acuity of 20/80 to 20/400 or better (Snellen equivalent) or logMAR visual acuity not worse than 0.6. Clinically relevant ophthalmic or systemic conditions may be excluded.
